channel.title: Forum Of Lies Special Edition: Upick[Blue Dragon Win!]
channel.description:
##Welcome
**Timer** https://www.piliapp.com/timer/countdown/ apparently
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game
**Gameplay** Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Black Rose will talk through a Quicktopic This is a Upick game, and so has special mechanics, each player, upon the game beginning, will PM me a name for their desired class, RNG will dictate which classes will be Blue Dragon and which will be Black Rose, and then I shall create them, this will take about 48 hours probably The classes will be more like in Mafia than ToL, meaning they will have 1 or 2 abilities maximum, also types will not be in play, just factions No Standard Classes shall exist When you receive your class card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it Balance isn't guaranteed
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" There will be no trial, if you reach a majority vote, the voted player will die Executions end the Day
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** Who knows what could happen? **Day:** Who knows what could happen?
**Journals** There shall not be Journals
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Rolelist:** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=purple]Black Rose[/color]** **[color=purple]Black Rose[/color]** **[color=purple]Black Rose[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral[/color]**
Players: 1. orangeandblack5 - Dead 2. deadfrien - Alive 3. FadeBlade - Dead 4. tardispaten - Dead 5. PolikShadowbliss - Dead 6. PokemonKidRyan - Dead 7. Damafaud - Dead 8. Hippolytus - Dead 9. Moleland - Dead 10. <strike>Bob</strike> finnhorizon - Alive 11. numberFTW - Dead
Graveyard: Moleland - **[color=steblue]Palace Guard[/color]** - Killed Night 1 PokemonKidRyan - **[color=purple]Yakuza[/color]** - Died of Cancer Day 2 orangeandblack5 - **[color=steblue]Vanilla Citizen[/color]** - Executed Day 3 Damafaud - **[color=grey]Snow White[/color]** - Executed Day 4 Hippolytus - **[color=steblue]Hippolytus' Foot[/color]** - Killed Night 4 PolikShadowbliss - **[color=steblue]Sane Princess[/color]** - Executed Day 5 numberFTW - **[color=purple]Nano[/color]** - Executed Day 6 numberFTW - **[color=purple]The Haunted One[/color]** - Executed Day 7 tardispaten - **[color=steblue]Furry[/color]** - Spooked Day 7

tardis, you messed up.

The only reason BD win is that one lucky shot D1.

You lynch orange without any good reason.
You put me on -1 when clearly someone can lynch me for lols like that.
You kill insane princess even though it’s clear what happened.
